name: Klein Tools 3005CR Wire Crimper Tool, Ratcheting Insulated Terminal Crimper for 10 to 22 AWG Wire
short_description: Crimps insulated terminals onto 10-22 AWG stranded copper wire
Adjustable compound action design puts more crimping power into each squeeze
Three crimping cavities in one tool: 22–16 AWG (Red), 16–14 AWG (Blue) and 12–10 AWG (Yellow) terminals
Built-in ratchet ensures full-cycle crimping for a uniform crimp every time
Unique cavity design provides consistent crimp from either side of the tool
Dial adjusts the amount of force applied to the crimp
Dual-material molded grips provide added comfort
product_description: The full-cycle Ratcheting Crimper crimps 10-22 AWG insulated wire terminals. This tool features three crimping cavities in one tool with color-coded wire markings for three size ranges of insulated terminals. Crimper design provides low effort to crimp while maintaining a high terminal pull-off force. Built-in ratchet ensures full-cycle crimping for a uniform crimp every time. Compound lever-action of narrow-span handles puts more crimping power into each squeeze. Comfort grips help reduce hand fatigue. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: LUNEY Ferrule Crimping Tool Kit with 1800PCS Wire Ferrules Kit Wire End Terminals & Crimper Plier, Self-adjustable Ratchet Tool Set for AWG 23-7 Cable connectors, 0.25-10mm² (1800PCS PLUS)
short_description: 1800PCS(PLUS+): You will receive ferrule crimping tool kit, which includes 1800wire end terminals and crimper piler (AWG: 23-7). And the crimping area is 0.25-10 mm². They can be used for industrial electricians, ferrule connectors, Electrical connectors, equipment switch, relay power supply, car audio, lamp, speaker wiring project, and so on

Professional Crimping Tool: Ferrules can be a reliable electrical connection, preventing fraying and breaking of single stranded conductors. Insulated ferrules also support the conductor, preventing breakage due to bending, wire stress and vibration

Wire End Terminals: Our brass plated wire end terminals are made of pure red copper and have good electrical conductivity. The sleeve is made of polypropylene. And their smooth tin plating process will improve oxidation resistance and extended service life

Self-Adjustable Ratchet: With self-adjustable ratchet, the crimper piler will adjust itself to the appropriate diameter for stripping terminals, which improves accuracy and reliability during crimping to avoid wasting terminals

Important: Before you start installing ferrules, make sure the wire is not live. You should never install ferrules on live wires! Please be sure to follow the operating procedures to maintain physical safety when using
